Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Cicero
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted WB: 87th, Pulaski & 81st; EB 81st, Pulaski & 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, Pulaski and 81st.

Eastbound buses will operate via 81st, Pulaski and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.
